bug.author: xkszltl
bug.summary: error: 'once_flag' in namespace 'std' does not name a type
bug.description:
Describe the bug <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5203025/91903805-70eda380-ecd6-11ea-983d-08934a4df620.png></denchmark-link>
Please include mutex as suggested. https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/thread/once_flag
System information
OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): CentOS 7 ONNX Runtime installed from (source or binary): source ONNX Runtime version: master GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): gcc-8 CUDA/cuDNN version: 11.0/8
